name: snottily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a snotty way (= rude and behaving badly, especially by showing people that you think you are better than them): When we asked her about ignoring our names on the waiting list, she said snottily, "We do the best we can." He sent a snottily written letter of complaint to the manager.
More examplesFewer examplesHe snottily informed my friend that reservations are held only for 10 minutes after the reservation time.Our ideas were sneered at as "out of date" by our snottily superior lecturer. I automatically, and rather snottily, corrected his grammar.
